oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hospitality Time - 1942-12-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Hospitality Time, originating from WSM. Originally broadcast 1942-12-27, part 1. Featuring Beasley Smith and his orchestra, Sissy O'Brien, Bob Johnstone, Betty (Alcyone Bate Beasley) and the Dixie Dons, and Jerri Sullivan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Beasley Smith; Sissy O'Brien; Bob Johnstone; Alcyone Bate Beasley; Dixie Dons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme -- Announcer opening statement -- Announcer introduces Sissy O'Brien, Bob Johnstone, and the orchestra -- Jingle Jangle Jingle (Sissy O'Brien, Bob Johnstone) -- Announcer talks -- Manhattan Serenade (orchestra) -- Announcer introduces Bob Johnstone -- White Christmas (Bob Johnstone) -- Announcer talks -- One Dozen Roses / Gobs Of Love (medley) (Betty and the Dixie Dons) -- Announcer talks -- Jersey Bounce (orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Hospitality time (Radio program); Smith, Beasley; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Beasley, Alcyone; Johnstone, Bob (Vocalist); O'Brien, Sissy
